concept.title: Accessibility Information
concept.shortdesc: Handicap accessibility varies within the 2010 building. The residents of the building believe all should have access to the entirety of 2010 E Hennepin. We have been negotiating with property management to get the building up to accessibility codes.

ul.li: The West Parking Lot has 3 handicap parking spots right across from the main entrance, which is labeled "Research Laboratories."
The East Parking Lot has no official handicap spots. However, there is a copious amount of parking in the east lot. Spots near the building doors are usually available.
Both parking lots are a mix of asphalt and gravel. Unfortunately, wheelchairs without thicker tires may be challenged.
The basement, first floor, and second floor of buildings 1, 2, and 3 are connected by a freight elevator.
A second person is necessary for operating the elevator. Find a resident to educate and help.

Please note, FOCI, the glass blowing collaborative, is not handicap accessible. The staff and volunteers at the collaborative have been working tirelessly with property management to bring the space to code. There will be a formal announcement when the structural improvements are made.

The most handicap accessible door is to Building 4 off the east parking lot. There is a ramp up to the door of the building. Once inside the building, an additional ramp leads straight the freigh elevator mentioned above.
